title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-9.1 - Application of this subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-9.1 - Application of this subpart

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart shall apply to
power-operated heavy equipment or machinery used in construction, demolition
and excavation operations. These provisions shall not apply to material or
personnel hoists (see Subpart 23-6) nor to cranes and derricks (see Subpart
23-8). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-9.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
